basic_information.scholarship_name: Richard and Helen Peters' Scholarship for Outstanding Academic Achievement in Applied Liberal Arts Award

description: This scholarship is sponsored by Emeritus Professor of History Dr. Richard Peters, and his wife Helen Peters, long-time adjunct professor at the University of Central Oklahoma. It recognizes a student's academic achievement in Applied Liberal Arts. Eligibility Requirements Applied Liberal Arts major Full-time or part-time undergraduate Meet standards set by program under direction of the Center for the Advancement of the Liberal Arts Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Applied Liberal Arts   or SIS_Major is Applied Liberal Arts   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Applied Liberal Arts   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Applied Liberal Arts
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Applied Liberal Arts   or SIS_Major is Applied Liberal Arts   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Applied Liberal Arts   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Applied Liberal Arts

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
